name: VIVAGLORY Sports Style Dog Life Vest, Dog Life Jacket for Swimming & Boating, Ripstop & Buoyancy for Puppy Doggy, Lifejacket with Handle, M, Blue
short_description: Unrestricted Movement: Designed with a ‘sports’ concept, the VIVAGLORY patented dog life vest opens up more around the neck and front chest. It doesn’t restrict your dog’s movement and avoids contact near the armpits and belly, preventing rubbing against your pup’s skin. Ideal for most breeds, especially those with broader or deeper chests, this dog swimming vest offers unmatched comfort during swimming and boating adventures

Superior Buoyancy: This dog lifejacket features evenly distributed buoyancy with ultra-buoyant foam covering under the neck, top, and sides. Supporting your dog's entire body, this dog floating vest helps them doggy paddle confidently and easily in any water setting—perfect for both experienced swimmers and beginners, whether in pools, lakes, or at the beach

Boosted Safety: Equipped with a sturdy handle and D-ring, this puppy life jacket allows for easy restraint and quick rescue if your puppy falls overboard or swims too far. Reflective strips and bright colors increase visibility, ensuring your doggy life jacket is easy to spot even in low-light conditions. The soft mesh belly band dries quickly for comfort, while adjustable straps with weight-bearing buckles guarantee a secure fit

Built to Last: Made from ripstop Oxford material that passed the CA65 test, this dog lifevest is durable enough for swimming, boating, floating, and paddle boarding. Reinforced stitching and a comfortable lining ensure long-lasting performance. Whether it's your first trip or a frequent outing, this dog flotation vest is designed to handle repeated water adventures. NOTE: Always supervise your dog during water activities, even when wearing the dog lifejacket

Universal Fit: The secure hook-and-loop fastening and adjustable buckled straps at the neck and belly of the dog swim vest provide a custom fit for your puppy. Putting the dog water vest on takes seconds. For best fit, measure the widest part of your dog’s ribcage and check the VIVAGLORY sizing chart

short_description: CONFIDENCE YOU CAN FEEL. From secure fit to buoyant design, every feature is built to keep your dog supported in the water. Giving you peace of mind on every swim, float, or paddle out.

FIND THE RIGHT FIT WITH EASE. Not sure which size to choose? Check out our sizing chart image and how-to-fit video to help you measure your dog correctly. A proper fit means more comfort, control, and confidence on every adventure.

FOR DOGS WHO LOVE TO SWIM. Strategically placed foam panels support a dog’s natural swim position. Offering confident flotation without restricting movement. A must-have dog life jacket for lakes, rivers, and surf.

STRONG HANDLE FOR LIFT & ASSIST. Low-profile handle is reinforced and perfectly placed for helping your dog back into the boat or up the dock. Ideal for boating, paddleboarding, or those “just in case” moments.
COMFORTABLE SECURE FIT. Adjustable telescoping neck closure ensures a snug, stay-put fit on all breeds. Designed to accommodate a wide range of dog types, including deep-chested and hard-to-fit dogs.

short_description: HIGH FLOATING DOG SWIMMING VEST - This ripstop dog life jackets is made of high-density Oxford material and filled with pearl cotton foam (EPE). So the dog life vests can provide a great buoyancy to support your doggie keeping afloat above the water when dog parent takes your pet for a swimming, boating, canoeing, kayaking, surfing. The life jacket for dogs keep your dog comfortable and safe in the currents.

BETTER WEARING EXPRIENCE - Different from the competitors, the life vest for dogs is closed by back zipper. What’s more, the puppy life vest is easy to adjust at abdomen and neck by lifting the plastic buckles there. Please read our instructions. These creative improvements make the life jacket for dogs is easier to put on and take off and more comfortable to use.

STRONG RESUCE HANDLE FOR EMERGENCY - There is a strong rescue handle with anti-slip grab on the back which allows dog parent lifting your pet out of the water quickly in case of some emergency. The double mental D-Ring hook beside the zipper is great for connecting a leash or toys.

LIGHTWEIGHT DOG LIFE PRESERVER - The dog life jacket for swimming is light-weight, adjustable, quick-drying and comfortable to use. The dog swimming vest is available in 5 sizes from XS through XXL for the most dog breeds including Yorkshire Terrier, Chihuahua, Poodle Terrier, French Bulldog, Dachshund, Boston Terrier, Great Dane etc.

HIGHLY REFLECTIVE DOG WATER VEST-The EW DESIGNED pet life jacket has 4 highly reflective straps at the back. Dog parent can easily find your furry friend under the water or at night. Fuchsia, Blue, Green are available for choice. They are the best boy dog life jacket and girl dog life jacket.

name: Outward Hound Granby Splash Orange Dog Life Jacket, Large
short_description: Dog Life Jacket: High-performance dog life vest provides maximum flotation for dogs of all swimming skill levels
Secure, Adjustable Fit: See our size chart and fitting video for guidance; full belly band and quick-release straps provide a snug, comfortable fit
High Visibility: Bright color with reflective trim help you spot your dog in low-light conditions
Smart, Safe Design: Front float supports head and neck; dual rescue grab handles for lifting and assisting your dog in the event of an emergency
Durable & Lightweight: Ripstop material with thick foam padding ensures buoyancy, strength, and comfort in and out of the water
product_description: The Outward Hound Granby Dog Life Jacket is built for safety, comfort, and confidence in the water. Whether your dog is an experienced swimmer or just getting started, this high-buoyancy life vest offers strong flotation support, ensuring they stay afloat while swimming, boating, or playing at the beach. Bright colors with reflective accents enhance visibility, while top grab handles make it easy to lift and assist your dog. A front neck float provides extra head support, and adjustable straps with quick-release buckles ensure a secure and comfortable fit. Crafted from durable ripstop material, this lightweight life vest allows for natural movement, making it a must-have for water-loving pups. Available in multiple sizes - xs, small, medium, large, and xl - to fit a wide range of breeds, the Granby Life Jacket keeps your dog safe, supported, and stylish on every aquatic adventure. Please select the appropriate dog life jacket size after taking your dog's girth measurement along the widest part of their rib cage. Make sure to take any other unique traits (i.e., large shoulders, long torso) into consideration.

name: ZLX Dog Life Jacket, High Buoyancy Dog Life Vest with Secure Handle, Ripstop Lifejacket for Swimming, Boating, Water Safety, Adjustable Lightweight Floating Pet Preserver, Large, Blue
short_description: 【Perfect Size Fit Customized】ZLX dog life jacket comes in 4 sizes(S-XL) to fit all small, medium, and large dogs. ZLX dog life vest features adjustable straps with quick-release buckles for a snug, supportive fit, ensuring comfort for dogs of all shapes and sizes. For the best fit, please refer to our detailed size chart and measure your dog's ribcage at the DEEPEST part. Tips: If your dog is between two sizes, we suggest the larger one

【Durable Superior Flotation Fabric】Crafted from tear-resistant ripstop 800D Oxford fabric & nylon combined with breathable mesh fabric, ZLX dog life jacket ensures exceptional durability and efficient quick drying. Features ultra-buoyant foam panels (20% thicker vs. standard) for maximum lift, feeling comfortable while keeping your dog's head above water effortlessly, and never restricting movement. Let your dogs enjoy swimming freely and safely in the water

【Smart Safety Handles & Leash Hook】The heavy-duty top rescue grab handles with anti-slip grip for instant control, ZLX dog life vest allows you to easily lift and assist your dog when needed. The reinforced D-ring hook provides a reliable attachment point for leashes, ensuring your dog stays close and safe during water activities

【Adjustable & Secure Dog Life Jacket】ZLX dog life jacket features partial dual safety systems with quick-release buckles and reinforced magic stickers for a snug, escape-proof fit, ensuring security for the perfect dog swim vest fit. Adjustable straps ensure comfort for all-day wear while keeping the vest securely in place

【Lightweight Vest for Active Adventures】Premium material makes ZLX dog lifejacket more body conforming for maximum comfort and looks less bulky than other jackets. Double-stitched seams resist punctures from rocks or claws, ensuring long-lasting use for outdoor adventures. The front neck float offers additional support to help keep their head above water

【Stylish Design】ZLX dog life vest keeps your dog stylish and highly visible during pool play, beach outings, or boating trips. The eye-catching design ensures safety while making your pup the center of attention in any water adventure. ZLX life vest is a must-have for water-loving pets

Whether you're at the pool, lake, or beach, your dog will feel comfortable and confident in this dog floating vest

Comfort & Durability: The neoprene design allows this dog life jacket to better conform to your dog's body for comfort and a sleek look—less bulky than older models. Precise stitching and thickened materials ensure long-term durability, making it not only a reliable doggy life jacket but also a trusted dog water vest for repeated water adventures

Stylish & Attractive: With bright colors, reflective elements, and a top handle for easy control, this dog swimming vest offers both safety and style. Fastening Securely: The fastening system around the belly keeps the dog flotation vest securely in place. Adjustable straps and quick-release buckles around the belly and neck ensure a snug yet flexible fit. Measure Before Purchase: Before choosing a VIVAGLORY dog lifevest, measure your dog’s ribcage at the deepest point. Do NOT rely on weight or sizing from other brands.
